entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:11AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...KENNICOTT GLACIER DAMMED HIDDEN LAKE RELEASING... Hidden Lake, which is dammed by the Kennicott Glacier, has begun to release and may cause a significant rise on the Kennicott River at McCarthy. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:39AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: …High water on the Tanana River into the Weekend… The Tanana River is running near bankfull at some locations between Tok and Manley Hot Springs. This is the result of a combination of heavy rain and recent warm weather causing significant snowmelt and glacial runoff.
